name: Kingmaker (itch) (Sibi, ChuChuGeralt)
description:
Windows Version

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZvmvdNfew5s4Goa6-FQDwbRq9ZSD55i-/view?usp=shari...

Unfortunately I couldn't upload the Windows version in time because Unity wouldn't build. Had to reinstall everything to fix it :(

No adjustments were made in this version, it just looks and feels nicer!

Please try it out as the WebGL version is just a rushed-out backup to keep the deadline!

How to Play

The white king has gone mad with power in this out of control chess game! 
Fortunately you have the power to charm any chess piece and make them fight for you!

  • Click the white or grey chess pieces in order to "turn them"
  • Win by either defeating the enemy king or his entire army
  • Protect your king or you will lose
Tips
  • Chess pieces always try to capture other pieces
  • If no other piece is reachable they move randomly
  • Grey pieces are neutral and only wander around randomly
Known Bugs
  • The white king can be turned
    "He doesn't take kindly to such frivolous actions and will prevent you from winning the battle!"
  • The white king sometimes spawns inside other pieces
    "He likes to have a tight grip on his minions!"
